channel.title: Adding a shop?
channel.description:
Hey guys,I'm struggling to add a shop. I'm new to coding.
I'm using Geckscape V2 Source.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510896.0.html It's a 317.
I don't know where to make it spawn and make the interface. I looked at some tutorials but there were things like: Autospawn.cfg However this way not there.
Please help

item.title: Adding a shop?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Thanks for using it, and ill help you through this.

Data/cfg/shops.cfg

First go to shops.cfg and make a new line or clear an exisiting one.

then go to spawn-config.cfg

now once you have goten the shop you want, and the npc inplace. Save & compile.

now go to: src/server/model/players/actionHandler

if the npc opens the shop on the first click search : public void firstClickNpc(int npcType) {

now make a new case

case NpcId that opens the shop: c.getShops().openShop(the shop number it opens); break;

thats about it

Read full topic
